ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of ELIZABETH A. WADEMAN of Toronto, Ontario, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective March 28, 2022.
